name: Senpai III
summary:
Senpai III is the third instalment of my Senpai series of releases and this time, it's a full length album. Follow the story of Megumi, Hanako, Mari, and Reina as they chart their courses into their future and find out how to keep music a part of their lives as they graduate high school and go into university, music school, work, and beyond.

released January 8, 2021

A huge thanks to Aza for all her time and patience in proof-reading the novella as well as giving up a huge chunk of her time going over the novella with me in a Discord voice call.

All songs written, recorded, mixed and mastered by myself.
I played all the guitars, bass and tried a bit of piano.
